actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating the American rose as the national floral emblem of the United States of America.

summary.text: Declares the flower commonly known as the rose to be the national floral emblem of the United States of America. Requests the President of the United States to declare such fact by proclamation.

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the American rose as the national floral emblem of the United States of America.
